Gestion des données¶

Structure de la base de données¶

modéle profiles¶

class profiles.models.Profile(*args, **kwargs)¶

Store a profil with a link with the auth.models.User

Paramètres:

  • user (auth.models.User) – user account

  • favorite_city (str) – Preference of the user

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶

modéle lettings¶

class lettings.models.Address(*args, **kwargs)¶

Store a single adress

Paramètres:

  • number (int) – address number

  • street (str) – street name

  • city (str) – city name

  • state (str) – state abbreviations

  • zip_code (int) – 5 number zip code

  • country_iso_code (str) – 3 letters iso code

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
class lettings.models.Letting(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to store a letting adress

Paramètres:

  • title (str) – title of the letting

  • address (lettings.Address) – address linked to the letting model

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
